_sText:
021212 edit:
===========
I didn't know about the nav editor when i built this map, so playing with more than a couple bots will be really laggy. I'll try adding a navagation file and add info_nodes soon, and hopefully bot play will be better.


Introduction
============
Just decided to try to make this in CS:S as my first real map for the source engine, watching my friends play Black Ops. I don't own BLOPS, so i used google images and youtube for reference.     

I know it could be a lot better and many issues, including the quality/presentation of the carepackages, custom textures, better/origininal models by me, etc, will be improved in the final version.

Thanks for taking a look!       
= )
    
    
NOTE
====
I'm willing to make ANY changes to the map if you'd like to throw it on a server. I HAVE NOT had much opportunity to test so i know there are many bug/issues i probably don't even know about!

   
Bug reports and anything else, contact:
=======================================
Steam: captain0terror@gmail.com   
gmail: captain0terror@gmail.com   
MSN: captain0terror@hotmail.com   
     
      
Links
=====
[Full README](http://localhostr.com/file/3czLJad/nuketown%20README_.txt)(Best viewed in Notepad!)

More images, information, and the HL2DM port(EXACTLY the same as the CS:S version, except it has DM and TDM spawns, and deathmatch weapons), [Visit Here](http://twhl.info/vault.php?map=5640).
